description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play against friends and show them who has the best control over the  ball. In this fast and interactive game no moment will be a slow one.  With game modes as Goal Hunting, Deatmatch, Team Deathmatch and  Hunted, and with 10 different maps, you can be sure you get a lot of gameplay  for your money. This game is the ultimate party game!
